dict.string: DeskOS needs access to local networks to load web pages.
DeskOS needs access to camera to take photos and videos.
DeskOS needs access to microphone to record audio.
DeskOS needs access to your photos to display and share images.
DeskOS needs access to save photos to your photo library.
DeskOS needs access to your location for location-based features.
DeskOS needs access to your contacts for mail and communication.
DeskOS needs access to your calendar to manage events.
DeskOS needs access to reminders to manage tasks.
DeskOS needs access to your music library.
DeskOS needs access to speech recognition for voice commands.
DeskOS needs access to Bluetooth to connect to devices.
DeskOS needs access to Bluetooth devices.
